GSD.description: color.js 1.4.1 has an infinite loop added by the primary developer. This was introduced intentionally in commit 074a0f8ed0c31c35d13d28632bd8a049ff136fb6. It has sionce been fixed and color.js version 1.4.2 has been released. GitHub has suspended Marak's account and NPM has reverted to a previous version in order to fix this.
